html: 3.1.24  6:50 pm   i'm trying to record a track (well, a rendition of an existing song) and i can't get a good take of the main melody on the lead instrument. this is holding me back from getting the rest of it done even though i have a general outline of how i want the arrangement/instrumentation to be. any suggestions? just record a really bad take and build the rest from there and maybe re-record it after everything else is done? every single dang take i say "no this isn't good enough" delete it and start over. it's been MONTHS

2.29.24  12:47 am   Do you see the potential in using lucid dreaming to streamline the dreaming process or do you think that ruins the point?
